item.description: #OrcasFire - Contained - Brush Fire; INC#0778; 01:20PM; Hansen Dam Recreation Area; MAP: https://bit.ly/hansendam; #LakeViewTerrace; LAFD ground and air units, with support from Los Angeles County (LACoFD) and Angeles National Forest (ANF) Firefighters responding in Automatic Aid, assisted by L.A. Park Rangers, have fully controlled the perimeter of the fire to a now estimated one-quarter (0.25) acre of heavy brush in the Hansen Dam Recreation area, a Mutual Threat Zone near the agencies' common border. No injury. No infra/structure damage. No evacuation. LAFD units will remain at scene for at least two hours to handle overhaul of smoldering debris. Fire cause under active investigation. ; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 AR1 AR7 BC12 BC14 CE83 CM40 CM42 CW3A E24 E274 E275 E298 E7 E75 E77 E8139 E8140 E89 E90 EM12 H1 H3 H4 HA1 HA3 RA74 T74 T75 T98 WT77 + LACoFD + ANF + Park Rangers; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

#OrcasFire - Brush Fire; INC#0778; 12:10PM; Hansen Dam Recreation Area; MAP: https://bit.ly/hansendam; #LakeViewTerrace; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response with the Los Angeles County (LACoFD) and Angeles National Forest (ANF) Firefighters in Automatic Aid, to one-half (0.50) acre of heavy brush, with moderate rate of spread (potential for 3 acres?) in the Hansen Dam Recreation area, a Mutual Threat Zone near the agencies' common border. No injury. No infra/structure threat. No evacuation. This fire, within LAFD jurisdiction, is known at the "Orcas Fire".; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC14 CW3A E24 E274 E275 E298 E7 E75 E77 E8139 E8140 E89 E90 EM12 H1 H3 H4 HA1 HA3 T74 T75 T98 WT77 + LACoFD + ANF; CH5; 17; - Brian Humphrey

Contained - Brush Fire; INC#1445; 08:50PM; Hansen Dam Recreation Area; MAP: https://bit.ly/hansendam; #LakeViewTerrace; LAFD ground and air units, with support from L.A. Park Rangers, have stopped forward progress of the three separate spot fires in medium-to-heavy brush to a total of approximately one-half (0.50) acre within the Hansen Dam Recreation Area. These fires were *different from and somewhat distant* to the fires earlier in the day (LAFD Incident #0840). No injury. No infra/structure damage. No evacuation. The specific cause of these and earlier spot fires remain under investigation.; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC15 E24 E274 E275 E290 E60 E75 E77 E8140 E89 E90 E98 EM15 H2 H3 HA2 HA3 PB98 T74 T75 T90 WT77 + Park Rangers; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Park Rangers report of three separate spot fires in medium-to-heavy brush within the Hansen Dam Recreation Area. These fires are *different from and somewhat distant* to the fires earlier today. No wind. No infra/structure threat. No evacuation.; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC15 E24 E274 E275 E290 E75 E77 E89 E90 E98 EM15 H2 H3 HA2 HA3 T74 T75 T90; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Contained - Brush Fire; INC#0840; 02:10PM; Hansen Dam Recreation Area; MAP: https://bit.ly/hansendam; LakeViewTerrace; Despite a slight wind, LAFD ground and air crews, with air support from ANF and LACoFD, have stopped forward progress of all spot fires in the Hansen Dam Recreation Area at less than two acres. No injury. No infra/structure damage. No evacuation. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 BC14 CM40 CM42 E18 E24 E275 E290 E298 E7 E75 E77 E8140 E89 E90 E91 E98 EM15 H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 HA3 PB98 RA18 T75 T90 T98 WT77 + ANF + LACoFD; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Slight wind. No infra/structure threat. title.a: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 10/05/2022 INC#0185

item.description: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0185; 04:11AM; 1917 E 2nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3e2lJHT; #BoyleHeights; 87 Firefighters took just 34 minutes in largely offensive operations to access, confine and fully extinguish flames within a two story, 2, 081 square-foot home (built 1900) with heavy interior storage and intense fire on the 2nd floor and attic. One adult male with burn injury was transported to an area hospital in serious condition. No other injuries reported. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E1 E17 E2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E210 E227 E25 E3 E4 EA1 EM1 HR3 RA2 RA3 RA803 T1 T10 T2 T27 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0185; 03:37AM; 1917 E 2nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3e2lJHT; #BoyleHeights; PRELIM: Two story home with heavy fire on the 2nd floor and attic.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E1 E17 E2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E210 E227 E25 E3 E4 EM1 HR3 RA2 RA3 RA803 T1 T10 T2 T27 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire #SotoFire 10/04/2022 INC#0951

item.description: Update #SotoFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0951; 04:40PM; 1308 S Soto St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3fK0Tx5; #BoyleHeights; LAFD personnel remain at scene performing overhaul of smoldering debris and supporting the still active investigation. There are now a total of two LAFD personnel transported to an area hospital in fair condition for separate non-life threating injuries sustained during the earlier firefight, including the earlier mentioned LAFD Fire Captain still being evaluated for a sudden medical illness, and an LAFD Firefighter with a knee injury. No other injuries reported.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; - Brian Humphrey

Update #SotoFire Structure Fire; INC#0951; 02:55PM; 1308 S Soto St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3fK0Tx5; #BoyleHeights; The injured LAFD firefighter has been taken to an area hospital in fair condition for further evaluation of what appears to be minor medical illness.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 AR10 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM21 CM22 E10 E14 E17 E2 E202 E203 E209 E21 E210 E227 E266 E3 E89 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA13 RA17 RA264 RS3 SQ21 T10 T2 T27 T3 T66 T9 UR3 UR88 + 2 LACoFD Engines; CH7; 13 14; Brian Humphrey
